summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 13420, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 5 of Yesler's Second Addition to the City of Seattle, said block being located between East Pine Street and East Olive Street and Twenty-fourth Avenue and Twenty-fifth Avenue, by grading and guttering said alley in accordance with Resolution No. 826 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency, approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899."
